page.title: 06HOUSE PRICES IN TELFORD
page.content: We looked at the{price of houses}for sale in our block during the week June 19th-25th in the{Shropshire Star.}The average price of a house in each area is as follows:- {Little Dawley}Â£19,200 3 bedroom semi {Dawley Bank}Â£24,725 3 bedroom detached {Dawley}Â£21,950 3 bedroom detached {Hollinswood}Â£15,750 3 bedroom town house {Aqueduct}Â£17,250 3 bedroom semi {Brookside}Â£11,200 3 bedroom terrace {Stirchley}Â£21,025 3 bedroom deteached {Malinslee}Â£15,950 3 bedroom terrace {Dawley Bank}is the most expensive place to live. {Brookside}is the cheapest place to live. This is because the houses for sale are all{ex T.D.C.terraced houses on large estates.
